Emily Lim
Multimedia Designer
Artist

Hi! I'm Emily Lim

I am the Marketing Design Lead at PlayDots Inc., mobile game studio, part of the Take-Two Interactive family. Based in New York.

I am a multimedia designer that specializes in performance marketing- ad asset production, analysis, strategy & creative direction and app store optimization. I also have experience in Art direction, brand development, graphic & web design, traditional & digital illustration, animation & video production, 2D / UI game development.

Outside of work, I love to play video games and create custom toys.

Download Resume

Skillset

Project & Workflow Management

My job is to solve problems, and create workflows that allow my team to be self-sufficient and independent. Communication is important in setting expectations and realistic deadlines.

JIRA | Trello | Google Sheets

Illustration

Illustration is my first love and introduction into the design field. It is a skill I continuously develop in my work and enjoy in my personal time.

Photoshop | Procreate | Medibang Paint | Clip Studio Art

Motion Design

The bread and butter in performance marketing. Must have skill for video ads production. My own animation style tends to lean towards clear and efficient delivery of the product advertised.

After Effects

Visual Design

Graphic design is another passionate skill. I enjoy working on projects that involve creating visual assets for brands and games in both development, exploration and marketing.

Photoshop | Illustrator | Sketch | FIGMA

Web Design

I can create my own websites, marketing email campaigns as well as produce HTML5 playable ads. I am comfortable with scripts and can share the pain in the debugging process.

Sublime | Jekyll | GitHub
